templates.text: I regret that I will be unable to attend {event}. I have a prior commitment.
Unfortunately, I am unable to attend {event} due to a scheduling conflict.
I must regretfully decline your invitation to {event}.
I am unable to attend {event} as I have a conflicting obligation.
I regret to inform you that I cannot be present at {event}.
Please accept my apologies, but I will not be able to attend {event}.
An unavoidable commitment prevents me from attending {event}.
I have an engagement on {day} that precludes my attendance at {event}.
Circumstances prevent me from joining {event}. My apologies.
I will not be available for {event} on {day}. Please excuse my absence.

I regret to inform you that I will be unable to attend {event} on {day}. An unforeseen circumstance has arisen that requires my attention. I apologize for any inconvenience and hope we can find another time to connect.
Thank you for the invitation to {event}. Unfortunately, a prior commitment on {day} prevents me from attending. I would be very pleased to arrange an alternative time to meet.
I appreciate you thinking of me for {event}. Regrettably, I have an existing obligation on {day} that I cannot reschedule. I hope you understand and look forward to future opportunities.
It is with sincere regret that I must decline {event} on {day}. An unavoidable matter requires my attention. I value this opportunity and hope we can arrange an alternative.
I must express my regret that I cannot attend {event}. A matter of importance has arisen on {day} that demands my presence. I trust you understand and hope to connect soon.
Please accept my apologies for being unable to join {event} on {day}. An unexpected situation has developed that requires my immediate attention. I would welcome the opportunity to reschedule.
I am writing to inform you that I will not be able to attend {event} due to a conflict in my schedule on {day}. I apologize sincerely and hope we can find a mutually convenient time.
Unfortunately, pressing matters prevent me from attending {event} on {day}. I deeply regret any inconvenience this may cause and remain hopeful that we can meet at another time.
I'm sorry, but I won't be able to make it to {event}. Something came up.
I can't make it to {event}. Sorry about that!
Sorry, I have something on {day} and can't attend {event}.
I wish I could come to {event} but I'm not available on {day}.
Unfortunately, I can't make it to {event}. Hope you understand!
I'm not going to be able to come to {event}. Something came up.
Can't join you for {event}. Sorry to miss it!
I've got a conflict on {day}. Won't make it to {event}.
Sorry, {day} doesn't work for me. Can't do {event}.
I'm busy on {day} so I'll have to skip {event}. Sorry!
Won't be able to attend {event}. Something's come up.
I have other plans on {day}. Sorry I'll miss {event}!
I'm really sorry, but I won't be able to make it to {event} on {day}. Something unexpected came up and I need to take care of it. I hope you understand, and I'd love to reschedule!
Thanks for the invite to {event}! I really wish I could be there, but I've got something else going on {day}. Let's definitely catch up soon though!
I'm sorry but I can't make it to {event} this time. I already have something planned for {day}. Can we find another time to meet up?
I hate to miss {event}, but I've got a prior commitment on {day} that I can't get out of. Let's plan something for another day!
Something came up on {day} and I won't be able to come to {event}. I'm really sorry! Hopefully we can reschedule soon.
I wish I could join you for {event}, but {day} just doesn't work for me. Rain check? I'd love to catch up another time!
Thanks for thinking of me for {event}! Unfortunately, I'm tied up on {day}. Let me know when you're free next and let's make plans!
I can't make it to {event} because I've got something I can't move on {day}. Super bummed to miss it! Let's hang out soon though.
Really sorry but I have to pass on {event}. Got a conflict on {day} that I can't change. Let's definitely do something else soon!
I'm not going to be able to make {event} on {day}. Something else came up that I need to handle. Hope you have fun, and let's catch up after!
Sorry, can't make it to {event}. Something came up!
Can't come to {event}. Got stuff going on!
Gonna have to skip {event}. Something came up.
Not gonna make it to {event}. Sorry!
Gotta pass on {event}. Busy that day!
{day} is no good for me. Can't do {event}.
Something popped up. Skipping {event}!
Can't swing {event} this time. Sorry dude!
Busy on {day}. Missing {event}!
Nah, can't make {event}. Got other plans.
Won't be there for {event}. Catch ya next time!
Pass on {event}. Something else going on.
Hey, really sorry but I can't come to {event}. Something came up last minute and I gotta deal with it. Let's catch up soon though!
Dude I'm so bummed but I gotta skip {event}. Got something on {day} I can't move. Let's hang soon!
Can't make it to {event} - got stuff going on. Super annoying! Hit me up for next time though.
Ugh something came up on {day} so I can't do {event}. Let's reschedule soon!
Hey, not gonna make {event}. Already have plans for {day}. Let's catch up another time!
Wish I could come to {event} but {day} doesn't work. Rain check? Let's do something soon!
Something popped up and I gotta deal with it. Missing {event} but let's hang after!
Can't swing {event} this time around. Got other stuff to handle. Next time for sure!
Gonna have to pass on {event}. {day} is packed for me. Let's plan something else soon though!
Hey! Can't make {event} because something came up. Bummed about it but let's catch up soon!
Due to unforeseen circumstances, I must decline {event}.
I have a prior engagement and cannot attend {event}.
I am grateful for the invitation to {event}. However, I have a scheduling conflict on {day} that I am unable to resolve. I hope we can arrange to meet at a more suitable time.
Thank you for including me in {event}. Regrettably, a prior commitment on {day} takes precedence. I would be honored to reschedule at your earliest convenience.
Something unexpected came up. Can't make {event}.
I'm tied up on {day}. Sorry I can't join {event}!
An unexpected situation came up on {day} that I need to handle. I'm really sorry to miss {event}! Can we reschedule for next week?
I had something come up last minute and can't make it to {event}. So sorry about this! Let's definitely find another time.
Things came up. Skipping {event}!
Life happened. Can't do {event}.
Life got crazy and I can't make it to {event}. Sorry! We should hang out soon though.
Things are hectic on {day} so I'm gonna miss {event}. Let's chill another time!
A matter requiring my attention prevents me from joining {event}.
An important matter has arisen that requires my immediate attention on {day}. As such, I will be unable to attend {event}. I sincerely apologize and hope to connect with you soon.
Got something I need to handle. Missing {event}.
I've got something important to take care of on {day} so I won't be able to come to {event}. Super sorry! Let's plan something soon.
Dealing with stuff. No {event} for me.
Got some stuff to handle on {day} so I can't hit up {event}. Bummer! Let's do something next week.
Personal matters prevent my attendance at {event}.
I must attend to personal matters on {day} and will therefore be unable to join {event}. I apologize for any inconvenience and look forward to reconnecting.
Personal stuff came up. Can't make {event}.
I've got some personal things to handle on {day} so I won't be able to make it to {event}. Sorry about that! Let's catch up soon.
Personal stuff. Gotta skip {event}.
Got some personal stuff going on so I can't come to {event}. Hit me up for next time though!
I have made other arrangements for {day} and cannot attend {event}.
I have already committed to other arrangements on {day} and will be unable to attend {event}. I regret any inconvenience this may cause and hope to join you on another occasion.
Already have plans on {day}. Can't do {event}.
I've already made plans for {day} so I won't be able to come to {event}. Sorry to miss it! Let's do something another time.
Already got plans. Missing {event}!
I already have stuff going on {day} so I can't make {event}. Let's hang out another time though!
Double-booked on {day}. Sorry about {event}!
I accidentally double-booked myself on {day} and can't make it to {event}. So sorry! Let's definitely reschedule.
Totally double-booked. Can't do {event}!
Ugh I double-booked myself like an idiot. Can't make {event}. Let's do something else soon!
